name: UWeather
description: Current weather and 3-day forecast with smart cache and multi-provider support.

preferences.name: Keyword
preferences.description: Type this keyword to trigger the weather search.

preferences.name: Weather Provider
preferences.description: Choose which weather service should provide the data.

preferences.name: OpenWeather API Key
preferences.description: Required only if OpenWeather is selected as provider.

preferences.name: Temperature Unit
preferences.description: Select how temperature values should be displayed.

preferences.name: Location Mode
preferences.description: Choose automatic detection (IP-based) or a fixed city.

preferences.name: Static City
preferences.description: Used only if Location Mode is set to 'Static city'.

preferences.name: Display Mode
preferences.description: Choose how detailed the weather information should appear.

preferences.name: Language
preferences.description: Select the interface language of the extension.
